title: Disconnecting Every 3 Minutes
body:
Hey all!
So I have a problem that I cannot for the life of me solve. My client itself works fine, up until I get into a game. Anywhere from 0 to 2 minutes in, I disconnect for about 20 or 30 seconds. Then, after the first disconnect, I disconnect again every 3 minutes on the dot. So if I first disconnect at 1:30, I disconnect at 4:30, 7:30, 10:30, etc.

At first, I thought it was the alpha client that I got to download and try. But after trying to repair my League and uninstalling the alpha client, I still have the same problem. Can anybody help me fix this issue? Please, I can't even play an ARAM without this happening.

EDIT: I should add, by the way, that I checked my logs of lag. Everything was fine there.

replies.body: Okay, thank you sooo much for your help! I'll definitely get those logs going and submit a ticket.

Well, I've been following the connection issue page with no luck. Although, something different happened. I dced around the 1 minute mark, but reconnected 20 to 30 seconds later, like normal. After that, I dced at 4 minutes and then when I finally reconnected, the game was paused, as usual. But then, maybe 3 or 4 seconds later, the game crashed and showed a bug splat. I sent the report describing this issue.

There may be a series of issues here ranging from connection to your game files.  We'd like to work with your specific issue individually through [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can work with you until we get this fixed for good.  It would be helpful to have some logs ready to get some more context on the situation:

[Network Analysis](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)
[Network Information Log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4)
[Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)

Thanks for your patience!  We'll get through this and fixed up; you're in good hands!

Oh, sorry. I guess I should have specified. I didn't think I need to since I said that I uninstalled the alpha.
But yes, it's definitely happening on the live client. And no, there's no bug splats, just disconnecting every 3 minutes on the dot.

Thanks for following up and the additional info!  We can try a couple troubleshooting steps to figure out what's causing your network to lose connection with our servers.  Please go over each step in our[ connection issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide to get this resolved.  Let me know how that goes for you, and we can go from there.  I also suggest doing any testing in custom games so you don't incur any leaverbuster penalties.

Are these disconnections happening on the live client or the alpha?  What happens if you play on the normal client?  Are you receiving bug splats?  I don't have a lot of insight on Alpha, but these questions can give me a better idea of your specific issue.   Let me know and I'll try and help you out with this!
